**This isn't just a necklace, it's a work of art.**  Crafted with stunning copper inlay and featuring a gorgeous natural jade chalcedony deer pendant, this piece is a beautiful blend of nature-inspired design and intricate craftsmanship.

* **Turning heads at a party:**  The light catches the copper and chrysoprase, sparkling with an ethereal glow.
